i18n.key: Displays the last name and first name in the public profile.
From this date on, the document will no longer be published. If left empty, the document will be published indefinitely.
Format for long dates (notably applied on dates related to threads and posts). The syntax is the same as the one used by the date() PHP function.
Format for short dates (notably applied on member registration dates). The syntax is the same as the one used by the date() PHP function.
From this date on, the document will be published. If left empty, the document will be published immediately.
Member title displayed on the posts, the profiles and the member lists. These titles will only be displayed and do not affect the permissions of the member.
